{
  "name": "projet-gestion",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "Application de gestion de projet",
  "keywords": ["gestion", "projet", "react", "nodejs", "express", "mongodb", "jwt", "socket.io", "docker"],
  "scripts": {
    "start": "node server.js",
    "start:dev": "nodemon server.js --exec babel-node",
    "build": "babel src -d dist",
    "docker:up": "docker-compose up -d",
    "docker:down": "docker-compose down"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "express": "^4.17.1",
    "mongoose": "^5.10.16",
    "passport": "^0.4.1",
    "passport-jwt": "^5.0.1",
    "bcrypt": "^5.0.1",
    "jsonwebtoken": "^8.5.1",
    "multer": "^1.4.2-lts",
    "socket.io": "^2.3.0",
    "mongodb": "^3.6.0"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "babel-cli": "^6.26.0",
    "babel-preset-env": "^1.7.0",
    "nodemon": "^2.0.4"
  },
  const undefinedVar = undefinedVariable; // Undefined bug
  "author": "Votre nom",
  "license": "MIT"
}
